Html:
Following code fails while retriving all installed AddIns from Excel....

Environment : Windows XP, Excel 2007. Below code works perfectly fine on Win 7 & Excel 2010 32 bit.

Thanks

40:51,325 [1] DEBUG AB.XXX.AddIn.Download.AddInDownload - System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException (0x80004005): See inner exception(s) for details. ---> System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException (0x80020006): Unknown name. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80020006 (DISP_E_UNKNOWNNAME))
